Reference

All functions

createStudyTable()

Create a table of all studies currently in data.frame

createTaxonTable()

Create a table of most frequent taxa in a data.frame

frequencySigs()

Identify the most frequently recurring taxa in bugsigdb

getCriticalN()

countBug counts the frequency of the most commonly identified bug in a simulated signature. getCriticalN performs a Monte Carlo simulation to estimate the number of times the most frequent taxon is expected to be observed in a list of signatures

getMostFrequentTaxa()

Get the most frequently occurring taxa in a table of signatures

simulateSignatures()

Simulate a list of signatures based on a universe of taxa equal in size and length to some smaller set of signatures

subsetByCurator()

Subset a data.frame of signatures by curator
